# criteria.mesh_ratio { #pyLHD.criteria.mesh_ratio }

`criteria.mesh_ratio(arr)`

Compute the meshratio criterion for a given design

## Parameters

| Name   | Type          | Description     | Default    |
|--------|---------------|-----------------|------------|
| `arr`  | npt.ArrayLike | A numpy ndarray | _required_ |

## Raises

| Type       | Description                                            |
|------------|--------------------------------------------------------|
| ValueError | Whenever number of rows is less than number of columns |

## Returns

| Type   | Description          |
|--------|----------------------|
| float  | Calculated meshratio |

## Examples



```{python}
import pyLHD
random_lhd = pyLHD.random_lhd(n_rows=5,n_columns=5)
pyLHD.mesh_ratio(random_lhd)
```
